mapper.select: select r.rno,r.pno,r.ano,a.kno,p.pname, r.rtime, r.writing, r.state,r.start,p.phone from partimer p, reservation r, applylist a where p.pno=r.pno and a.ano=r.ano and a.kno=#{kno}

select re.rno, r.pno, a.ano, n.bname,r.pname,r.phone, re.rtime, re.state, re.start, re.writing from reservation re, applylist a, resume r, notice n where re.ano=a.ano and a.userno=r.userno and a.bno=n.bno and r.pno=#{pno} and a.ano=#{ano}
select count(*) from reservation where ano=#{ano}
select count(*) from reservation where start=#{start} and rtime=#{rtime}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation values((select ifnull(max(rno), 0)+1 from reservation r),#{pno},#{ano},#{rtime},#{writing},'대기',#{start})
mapper.update: update reservation set state='승인' where rno=#{rno}
update reservation set state='거부' where rno=#{rno}
